channel.title: CVE Feed for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons

item.title: CVE-2024-4606|2024-05-09T11:59:18.569Z -- BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.6.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31357|2024-04-08T08:51:56.122Z -- BdThemes -- Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in BdThemes Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Ultimate Store Kit Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.5.2.
